/**************************************************************************/
 How do build the DIR-857NA image
/**************************************************************************/

Step 1:
// install expect
yum install expect
export UBICOM_DONGLE=192.168.0.250:5010

Step 2:
a. Please check the svn revision number (rev_num) of the release note.
   (for example, SVN Revision: 100, so the rev_num is 100)
b. Checkout SDK from svn server
   svn co -r rev_num svn://172.21.32.250/IP8K/trunk/ubicom-distro_SDK_2.0

Step 3:
mv ubicom-distro_SDK_2.0 ubicom-distro
cd ubicom-distro
tar -jxvf toolchain.bz2
make clean
make distclean
make distclean_all

Step 4:
make menuconfig
   a. Ubicom Distro Configuration :
     Distro (uClinux)--> uClinux
     [*]Run distro menuconfig
     Board (IP7160DIR855Board_F.brd)--> IP8100_DIR857.brd
     LPJ (ultra7k.lpj)--> ultra8k.lpj
     [*]Regenerate ultra configs 
     [*]Enable U-Boot (build u-boot)

   b. uClinux Distribution Configuration :
     Vendor/Product Selection--> 
         Vendor(Ubicom)--> Ubicom
         products(DIR-657NA)--> DIR-857NA

   c. exit

Step 5:
make
make install_all

step 6:
// Debug
telnet 192.168.0.250 50

Others:
1.
   a. configs and UI floder: home\ubicom-distro\uClinux\vendors\Ubicom\DIR-857NA
   b. app floder: home\ubicom-distro\uClinux\user
   c. boards folder: home\ubicom-distro\ultra\boards
   d. rootfs folder: home\ubicom-distro\uClinux\romfs
2. board file put to ultra\boards and type menuconfig and it will list.
3. product floder put to uClinux\vender\Ubicom\ and modify config.linux-2.6.x for CONFIG_INITRAMFS_SOURCE

How to add the feature   
1. modiyf uClinux/user/Makefile - add CONFIG_FEATURE_NAME
2. modiyf uClinux/user/Kconfig - add FEATURE_NAME
3. modify uClinux/vendors/Ubicom/DIR-857NA/config.vendor - let CONFIG_FEATURE_NAME enabled in default
4  added uClinux/user/FEATURE_NAME folder and add main.c, README and Makefile in the folder.
 
How to modiofy nvram default value
1. modify uClinux/vendors/Ubicom/DIR-857NA/rootfs/etc/nvram.default

How to modify GUI page
2. modify uClinux/vendors/Ubicom/DIR-857NA/rootfs/home/www/*.asp and *.js
